bill.summary: This bill amends the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to require the Food and Drug Administration to describe the responsibilities of each agency center charged with reviewing drugs, medical devices, or biological products when reviewing a product that is a combination of drug, medical device, or biological product.
